member.name: P:com.ricoh.livestreaming.ReservedTasks.IsCompleted
member.summary: 保留中の全 Task を取り出したかどうか

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.ReservedTasks.Set(System.String,System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary:
保留する Task を登録する
IsCompleted = false の場合のみ登録可能
member.param: Task を識別するためのユニークなキー
member.returns: true : 登録成功、false : 登録失敗(IsCompleted = true で登録しようとした)

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.ReservedTasks.Get
member.summary:
保留中の Task を取り出す
IsCompleted = true を設定するためには、null が返却されるまで呼び出し続ける必要がある
取り出す Task の順序は登録順とは限らない
member.returns: 取り出した Task、取り出す Task がなくなった場合は、IsCompleted = true を設定し null を返却

member.summary: Start to disconnect from the server asynchronously.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.UpdateMeta(System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Update the connection metadata.
Specify only the key and value to be updated.
(Keys that have not been registered at the time of connection can't be added.)
member.exception: meta is null.
Thrown when the method was called other than Open state.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.UpdateTrackMeta(com.ricoh.livestreaming.LSTrack,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Update the LSTrack metadata.
Specify only the key and value to be updated.
(Keys that have not been registered at the time of connection can't be added.)
member.exception: Thrown when the method was called other than Open state.
Thrown when the method was called with a RoomSpecType other than SFU.
Thrown when LSTrack not found on LocalLSTracks.
is null.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.ChangeMediaRequirements(System.String,com.ricoh.livestreaming.VideoRequirement)

summary.para: Change the requirements of the Media for the specified connection partner.
The server decides how or whether to send the Media based on this specification.

member.param: Connection ID of the connection partner.
Whether or not to require video.
member.exception: Thrown when the method was called other than Open state.
Thrown when the method was called with a RoomSpecType other than SFU.
Thrown when the method was called with Option.ReceivingOption.Enabled set to false.
Thrown when a VideoTrack with the "connectionId" cannot be found in RemoteTracks.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.ChangeVideoSendBitrate(System.Int32)

summary.para: Change the send bit rate of Video.
It cannot be set to a value larger than the value specified at the time of connect (default value if not specified).

member.param: Send bit rate after the change.
member.exception: Thrown when the method was called other than Open state.
Thrown when the method was called with a RoomSpecType other than SFU.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.GetStats
member.summary: Get stats report data of peerConnections.
member.returns: key-value pairs. key is connectionId(If SFU connection, key is "sfu"). Value is stats report

summary.para: If the PeerConnectionState changes to "Connected" during "Unstable".
If the PeerConnectionState changes to "Disconnected" during "Stable".

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.ReplaceAllPeerLocalTracks(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,com.ricoh.livestreaming.webrtc.MediaStreamTrack.TrackType)
member.summary: Replace media stream track in all peer connections.
member.param: The track type of the media stream track to be replaced.

returns.para: Result of replace media stream track.
true if the replacement is successful or if there is no peer connection, false otherwise.
P2P peer connection exists only if other base is connected.

member.name: M:com.ricoh.livestreaming.Client.HardMute(com.ricoh.livestreaming.webrtc.MediaStreamTrack,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hardmute or unmute Media stream track.
member.param: Media stream track to set hardmute or unmute.
If false, disable the mediaStreamTrack for hardmute. If true, set the mediaStreamTrack for unmute.
